faqItems.question: What is the difference between DNS hosting and web hosting?
faqItems.answerTitle: What is the difference between DNS hosting and web hosting?
faqItems.answerDescription: Web hosting provides physical space for storing your website's data, while DNS hosting is responsible for converting domain names into IP addresses.

faqItems.question: Does DNS hosting affect my site's speed?
faqItems.answerTitle: Does DNS hosting affect my site's speed?
faqItems.answerDescription: Yes, fast and reliable DNS hosting will speed up domain resolution time, reducing the initial delay when loading a site.

what_is_dns_block.title: What is DNS?
what_is_dns_block.descriptionMain: DNS helps users find the required website through a search query in the browser.
what_is_dns_block.descriptionAdditional: A real 'address book' but online! For instance, to visit our website, you need to enter the domain name 'SpaceCore.pro' in your browser. For users, it is almost imperceptible redirection, and at the DNS server level, the IP address of the site, hidden behind beautiful letters, is processed!
